<js>
importClass(org.jsoup.Jsoup);
function get(www){U="&&";css="li.prev a";
www="https://wap.dulaidw.com/"+www+".html";
list=Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(www)).select(css).toArray().map(a=>a.text()+"::"+a.attr("href")).join(U).replace(/-1\//g,"-searchPage/");
return list;}
result=get("top")+U+get("sort");
</js>
